entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as looking terrified and leaping on her feet, sending books flying in every direction.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being with Ron and Hermione, and is referred to as 'we'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as complaining about the wedding and massaging his head.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as leaving the room with Hermione.

entities.name: delacours
entities.description: The Delacours are mentioned as arriving at the wedding.

relationships.description: Hermione hurried out of the room after Mrs. Weasley.
Ron and Harry are mentioned as being together.
The Delacours arrived at the wedding.
